trustfund:
TF024407-NTF-ESSD SOCIAL WINDOW : INDIA
            TRIBAL RIGHTS IN PROTECTED AREAS,TF034594-INDIA - ECODEVELOPMENT PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
In regard to project performance
            assessment ratings, the India Ecodevelopment Project had the
            following ratings: outcome was moderately satisfactory;
            sustainability was likely; institutional development impact
            was substantial; Bank performance was satisfactory; and
            borrower performance was satisfactory. Lessons learned from
            this assessment included: enhancing the capabilities of
            Ecodevelopment Committees (EDCs) to better link the
            management of protected areas with village development and
            livelihood needs; moving conservation practices into the
            wider landscape by integrating protected area activities
            with the rural/agriculture sector; better targeting of
            research and monitoring to serve the management priorities
            of protected areas; improving monitoring and evaluation
            indicators and their application to ensure benefits of
            conservation interventions; and using recent legislation in
            favor of sustainability to assist local communities realize
            the full benefit of sustainable development through more
            direct participation decision-making.
